prompts: Create a majestic Pokemon with a blend of blue and gold colors, resembling a mythical wolf.
Imagine a legendary creature that embodies the elegance of a sword and the ferocity of a lion.
Generate a stunning Pokemon featuring vibrant colors, sharp features, and an aura of strength.
Design a noble animal Pokemon that has fairy-like wings and a fierce demeanor.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that can traverse both land and air, adorned with intricate armor.
Make a Pokemon that channels the essence of both bravery and nobility through its appearance.
Give me a Pokemon with a sleek design and a color palette that inspires awe.
